title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Gallivanter Baller ST-D
content: We know what you’re thinking: another soccer mom SUV, perfect for going absolutely nowhere in the Los Santos rush hour. But what if we told you that you can install a Remote Control Unit, so you can commute to your secret bunker from the comfort of the hot tub in your penthouse? Or a Missile Lock-On Jammer, so you don’t have to worry about any hostile takeovers en route? That’s the kind of work-life balance you deserve. Introducing the Gallivanter Baller ST-D — it’ll grow on you.
